name: Heavy Tech Dossier: On the Foot Jungle
name_original: Heavy Tech Dossier: On the Foot Jungle
description:
Heavy Tech Dossier: On the Foot Jungle is a game developed by R. It came out on 23-05-2017.
Heavy Tech Dossier: On the Foot Jungle is available on PC and macOS. You can purchase the game on itch.io.
